description: From Middle English hore, from Old English hōre, from Proto-Germanic *hōrǭ, from Proto-Indo-European *kéh₂ros (“loved”), from *keh₂- (“to wish; desire”).

entries.meaning: (derogatory) Synonym of prostitute: a person (especially a woman) who offers sexual services for payment.
examples: I come looking for a jobBut I get no offersJust a come-on from the whores on Seventh Avenue

entries.meaning: (vulgar, derogatory) A person who is sexually promiscuous; a slut.
examples: So after he fucks the shit out of me, he tells me I'm lying about his whore not being Brad.

entries.meaning: (vulgar, derogatory) A person who is unscrupulous, especially one who compromises their principles for gain.
(vulgar, derogatory) A person who will violate behavioral standards to achieve something desired.

verbs.description: whore (third-person singular simple present whores, present participle whoring, simple past and past participle whored)

entries.meaning: (intransitive, vulgar) To engage the services of a prostitute.

examples: Did you see him on that chat show, whoring his new book?

entries.meaning: (transitive, slang, video games, vulgar, derogatory) To overuse something.
examples: BTW, that guy whuz still an asshole - camping the BFG and whoring the quad - I usually leave BFG maps but stuck around on that one and suicided quite a bit (3 times I got to about -10 frags, then came back to 0...).
